root.message: The INST_MANDATE field for indicator 5-c-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: UN Women is committed through its work at the global, regional and county level to support Member States in filling critical gaps in generating and using data, statistics, evidence and analysis on gender equality. As part of its triple mandate, UN Women supports Member States in setting norms. UN Women also assists in implementing norms and standards through its country programmes. In addition, UN Women leads and coordinates the UN system’s work in support of gender equality and the empowerment of women.
